title: Bladed staff

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bladed staves are a class of magic weapons that typically possess both fairly high melee and magic attack bonuses.

content:
Bladed staff
Primary typeMagic
Secondary typeMelee
Attack speed

Bladed staves are a class of magic weapons that typically possess both fairly high melee and magic attack bonuses.

Unlike other magic weapons, they are able to autocast Crumble Undead and Magic Dart, in addition to god spells depending on the type of bladed staff. They additionally have a fast attack speed of 4 when attacking with melee, on par with scimitars.
